translations: 井然有序的；整整齐齐的；整洁干净的

sentences.sentence: The house only needs an occasional coat of paint to keep it shipshape.
sentences.translation: 房子只需偶尔粉刷一次就可以保持其良好状态。

sentences.sentence: I get the house all shipshape while he is away.
sentences.translation: 他出远门时，我把房子收拾得整整齐齐。

sentences.sentence: I get the house all shipshape while he is away.
sentences.translation: 他不在的时候，我把房子打扫得干干净净，整整齐齐。
